text:
Raskolnikov had to drop out of university, but it was just a temporary setback. He was hustling hard to save up so he could go back. He hadn’t seen Razumihin in four months, and Razumihin didn’t even know where he lived. A couple of months ago, they bumped into each other on the street, but Raskolnikov just turned away and crossed to the other side to avoid being seen. Razumihin noticed him but decided to let it go, not wanting to make things awkward.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov has distanced himself from Razumihin, despite his desire to return to university and the latter's willingness to help.
